element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm crops a raster layer to the minimum extent of its valid values. Use this to remove outer areas that contain only no-data values.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: The raster layer to be cropped

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with its extent limited to the minimum extent of its valid values. This layer might, however, contain no-data values, if they cannot be removed without removing valid values.
